mapper.insert: insert into product( product_name, product_category, product_detail, product_main_image, product_detail_image, product_price, product_size, product_stock ) values( #{product_name}, #{product_category}, #{product_detail}, #{product_main_image}, #{product_detail_image}, #{product_price}, #{product_size}, #{product_stock} )
mapper.update: update product set product_status=true where product_idx=#{product_idx}
update product set product_status=false where product_idx=#{product_idx}

update product set product_name=#{product_name}, product_detail=#{product_detail}, product_price=#{product_price}, product_size=#{product_size}, product_stock=#{product_stock}, product_category=#{product_category}, product_main_image=#{product_main_image}, product_detail_image=#{product_detail_image} where product_idx=#{product_idx}
